landing.title: Company Spark
landing.description: An internal platform designed to ignite innovation from within. Through recurring hackathon-style events, employees across departments can form teams, develop ideas, and create solutions that push the company forward.
landing.subtitle: Unlocking creativity, encouraging collaboration, and making the most of our collective talent—across engineering, business, software, and operations.

benefits.title: Empower Your Ideas
benefits.description: Bring that side-project or breakthrough concept to life

benefits.title: Collaborate Across the Organization
benefits.description: Work with colleagues outside your usual bubble

benefits.title: Grow Skills
benefits.description: Learn, build, and innovate in a low-stakes, high-impact environment

benefits.title: Get Recognized
benefits.description: Winning teams get visibility and support for further development

howItWorks: Form a Team or join one based on interests and skills
Build a Solution during the hackathon cycle
Submit your project for review and feedback
Showcase on the public Company Spark dashboard

participation.individuals: Individual contributors may apply to join open teams

projectScope: Should align with company values: innovation, sustainability, technology, or employee wellbeing
Can be hardware, software, service-oriented, or process improvement
Must be original—no pre-existing or commercialized projects

evaluationCriteria.description: How novel or original is the idea?
Can it scale or improve a process internally?
How well did the team collaborate?
Is the final submission clear and compelling?

codeOfConduct: Intellectual property remains with creators unless otherwise agreed
Collaboration over competition—Company Spark is about growing ideas, not just winning
